property.name: shareUrl
property.label: Share URL
property.description: URL of the current page, used when copying the link to the clipboard and sharing it. Leave empty to infer it automatically.

property.name: copyLabel
property.label: Copy label
property.description: Label of the copy link button; leave empty to hide.

property.name: printLabel
property.label: Print label
property.description: Label of the print this page button; leave empty to hide.

property.name: shareLabel
property.label: Share label
property.description: Label of the share this page button; leave empty to hide.

property.name: shareConfig
property.label: Share configuration
property.description: Configuration on the channels to share on in JSON array format.
property.default: [{"network":"facebook","ariaLabel":"Share on Facebook","title": "Title","description":"Description","hashTags":"#design,#system"},{"network":"linkedin","ariaLabel":"Share on LinkedIn"},{"network":"twitter","ariaLabel":"Share on X (Twitter)","title":"Hi there!","hashtags":"#design,#system","user":"@digital_nsw"},{"network":"email","ariaLabel":"Share via Email","title":"Email Subject","description":"Content of my email."}]

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
